title: $1,100 - 2Bed 1 Bath Pilsen Apartment
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   2 Bedroom 1 Bath apartment in Pilsen! This property is in a great location, 5 min walk to the Pink Line (Western), and a 15 min train ride to the loop. It is a ground-floor apartment. Both bedrooms can fit queen beds, and each have their own spacious closet. Central Heating & Air. Shared laundry in building, free! Easy street parking (~$25 permit for whole year.) Landlord will do a background & credit check ($40). You must have a credit score 600 +, no eviction history, and your income must be $3,300 a month or above (3X Rent). $300 move-in fee, no security deposit. Water and garbage are included, all other utilities are tenants responsibility.
